document.full_text: the tampa bay rays have signed starting pitcher wade davis to a seven-year contract that could be worth $35.1 million to the right-hander, the team said on thursday.
document.title: rays sign starting pitcher davis to seven-year deal
lines_and_colors: the tampa bay rays have signed starting pitcher wade davis to a seven-year contract that could be worth $35.1 million to the right-hander, the team said on thursday.
